𓄥 σῶμα sôma “body”
𔕰 kwai in 𔕰𔗔𔓷 some-body
𒋢𒈬 soma: my body
𒍮𒊒 zum-ru somar “body” …mere

𒌝𒈠𒌅 ˠum-ma-tu soma™
𒌝𒈠𒌅 main body, bulk

𒌑𒈠𒄷 šam-ma-ḫu soma
𒌑𒈠𒄷 large intestine

Soma: famous serum ⇔ blood?

𒁁 uš₂ 𒅘 úš 𒂊𒌍𒄯 e-eš-ḫar ēshar असृज् asṛj *h₁ésh₂r̥ dúšr 𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓂐 *ᵟésHr̥ “blood” @PIE ⇔ Soma
𒁁𒈠 šum-ma … šum-ma comme … (or) comme … (with … or with)
𒁁𒈠 šum-ma … šum-ma[rum] 𓃹𓃺 sei … sei (either … or)
